ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Ternary Error Bar chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The TernaryErrorBarRenderableSeries requires an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyzDataSeries%601.html']XyzDataSeries[/url] as data source, wich contains X-point, Y-point and Z-point. This includes HighError and LowError for each series entry. In this example the same XyzDataSeries is re-used to render a Scatter chart, as these only take the X,Y and Z values.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
Do you need to change the length of the Error Bar Cup? Try setting ErrorBarCupLength. This alters how much space the bar takes up.
